p: The time required to inactivate the virus in wastewater plant effluents at a 99,9% rate (T 99.9) shows the rapid die off of the Coronavirus at 23 °C, from 2.3 to 3.5 days ( Table 2 ), registering a mean reduction > 3 log 10 in 3 days. Poliovirus 1 is able to survive for longer time, compared to Coronavirus ( Gundy et al., 2009).
